name: phensuximide
content: Phensuximide is an anticonvulsant in the succinimide class.   == External links == Diseases Database (DDB): 31648 Rankin G, Cressey-Veneziano K, Wang R, Brown P (1986). "Urinary tract effects of phensuximide in the Sprague-Dawley and Fischer 344 rat". J Appl Toxicol. 6 (5): 349–56. doi:10.1002/jat.2550060509. PMID 3772011. S2CID 40687770.
